ai-iti73:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti73:2.1_0: “Mendicants, formless states are more peaceful than states of form; cessation is more peaceful than formless states.”
ai-iti73:3.1_0: “There are beings in the realm of luminous form,
ai-iti73:4.1_0: But those who completely understand sensual pleasures,
ai-iti73:5.1_0: Having directly experienced the deathless element,
ai-iti73:5.4_0: having realized it with his own insight,
ai-iti73:6.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
